languages.text: "Вольный Торговец не против культа, теперь и инквизитор... Видимо, это логово убийц теперь никак не прикрыть".
"First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец не против культа, теперь и инквизитор... Видимо, это логово убийц теперь никак не прикрыть".

traits.locale_text: "First the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor, too... I guess there is no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

"First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

languages.text: "Erst gibt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem Kult einen Freifahrtsschein, nun auch noch ein Inquisitor ... Man kriegt diese Mörder wohl nicht mehr zurück in ihren Käfig."
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Erst gibt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dem Kult einen Freifahrtsschein, nun auch noch ein Inquisitor ... Man kriegt diese Mörder wohl nicht mehr zurück in ihren Käfig."

languages.text: « D'abord, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} donne son aval à la secte, et maintenant, c'est au tour d'un inquisiteur, rien de moins... Ma foi, ce n'est pas ça qui va calmer les ardeurs de cette clique d'assassins. »
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

traits.locale_text: « D'abord, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} donne son aval à la secte, et maintenant, c'est au tour d'un inquisiteur, rien de moins... Ma foi, ce n'est pas ça qui va calmer les ardeurs de cette clique d'assassins. »

languages.text: «Primero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da luz verde al culto y ahora lo hace un Inquisidor... Supongo que no puedo esperar que nadie limite a esta guarida de asesinos».
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Primero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente da luz verde al culto y ahora lo hace un Inquisidor... Supongo que no puedo esperar que nadie limite a esta guarida de asesinos».

languages.text: 「まず、ローグトレーダーは魔女団にゴーサインを出し、今度は異端審問官まで…この殺人鬼共を押さえつける方法はもうないようね」
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「まず、ローグトレーダーは魔女団にゴーサインを出し、今度は異端審問官まで…この殺人鬼共を押さえつける方法はもうないようね」

languages.text: “先是行商浪人觉得这个教派没问题，现在就连审讯官都这么说……我猜，这个杀人犯的巢穴已经再也不需要遮遮掩掩了。”
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

traits.locale_text: “先是行商浪人觉得这个教派没问题，现在就连审讯官都这么说……我猜，这个杀人犯的巢穴已经再也不需要遮遮掩掩了。”

languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."

languages.text: "Önce Hür Tacir tarikata onay veriyor, sonra da bir Engizisyoncu bunu tekrarlıyor... Anlaşılan bu katiller inini artık örtbas etmeye kalkışmayacağız."
languages.original_text: "First, the Rogue Trader gives the cult the go-ahead, now an Inquisitor does too... I guess there's just no putting a lid on this den of murderers anymore."
